item.title: Howi set ip to server
item.dc:creator: @Fluxedaway Fluxedaway
item.description:
@Fluxedaway wrote:

First if you have a router you need a port forward, for that go to www.portforward.com, i wont explain how to do it here because the variety (spell?) of routers out there and its somewhat a long process, after you did the port forward you need to get no-ip, to get no-ip go to www.no-ip.com and register an account, after that just spread your server details on the server advertisment forum and youâ€™re set after that :).

Read full topic

item.title: Howi set ip to server
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

Make a no-Ip address or just hand out your IP address. No-IP is more handy because people dont know when your IP has changed.
